alert.note: Alert for Gates (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gates County through 515 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gates, or near Sunbury. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gatesville, Sunbury, Gates, Roduco, Eure, Easons Crossroads, Savage, Acorn Hill, Hazelton, Buckland and Chowan Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
